Title: Evaluation of Knowledge Management System Application with Technology Acceptance Model Method in Education Division
Source title: 2018 International Conference on Orange Technologies, ICOT 2018
Affiliations: Information Systems Management Department, Nusantara University, Binus Graduate Program, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Primary Teacher Education Department, Bina Nusantara University, Faculty of Humanities, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Research Interest Group in Educational Technology, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Suroso, J.S., Information Systems Management Department, Nusantara University, Binus Graduate Program, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Sasmoko, Primary Teacher Education Department, Bina Nusantara University, Faculty of Humanities, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia, Research Interest Group in Educational Technology, Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia; Fadhillah, R., Information Systems Management Department, Nusantara University, Binus Graduate Program, Jakarta, 11480, Indonesia
Abstract: The purpose of this research is to design and evaluate the application of knowledge management using knowledge management system application based on technology acceptance model method in Education Division of PT. Yasiga Sarana Utama so that the quality of acceptance knowledge management system by the user runs well, with the hope to facilitate the performance of employees so as to improve the quality of sharing knowledge corporate culture. The research methods used include analytical methods (surveys of ongoing systems, observations on enterprise environments within the scope of the network, interviews with company staff and literature studies) and knowledge management system design methods, where knowledge management system is evaluated for performance and acceptability through method of technology acceptance model. The result of the research is the implementation of knowledge management system and the evaluation result using technology acceptance model method to measure the level of user acceptance. The conclusion of this research is by using knowledge management system and implementation of sharing knowledge culture, knowledge management and the use of knowledge management system owned by organization become more effective and efficient. © 2018 IEEE.
Author Keywords: knowledge management; knowledge management system; sharing knowledge; technology acceptance model
Index Keywords: Citrus fruits; Educational technology; Human resource management; Knowledge acquisition; Knowledge based systems; Education divisions; Enterprise environment; Evaluation of knowledge; Evaluation results; Knowledge management system; Literature studies; Sharing knowledge; Technology acceptance model; Knowledge management
